en: Ascribe unto Jehovah, O ye sons of the mighty, Ascribe unto Jehovah glory and strength.
hmr: Aw mi thilthawtheitak nauhai, LALPA kuomah pe unla, LALPA kuoma chun ropuina le hrâtna pe ro.

en: Ascribe unto Jehovah the glory due unto his name; Worship Jehovah in holy array.
hmr: LALPA kuomah a hming ropuina chu pe unla, Inthieng mawina inbelin LALPA chu chibai bûk ro,

en: The voice of Jehovah is upon the waters: The God of glory thundereth, Even Jehovah upon many waters.
hmr: LALPA râwl chu tuihai chunga chun ân rih a, Ropuina Pathien chu a hung inri dur dur a, LALPA ngei chu tui tamtak chunghaia chun a hung in- rih a,

en: The voice of Jehovah is powerful; The voice of Jehovah is full of majesty.
hmr: LALPA râwl chu thilthawtheitak a na, LALPA râwl chu ropuitak a nih.

en: The voice of Jehovah breaketh the cedars; Yea, Jehovah breaketh in pieces the cedars of Lebanon.
hmr: LALPA râwl chun Sidar thinghai chu sukthliek a ta, Anih, LALPA chun Lebanon tlânga sidar thinghai chu a sukthliek seng sung hlak.

en: He maketh them also to skip like a calf; Lebanon and Sirion like a young wild-ox.
hmr: Bâwngte tuoltla angin ân changtir hlak a, Lebanon chu bâwngte tuoltla angin ân châwmtir hlak a, Sirion tlânghai chu ramsiel tê ang elin.

en: The voice of Jehovah cleaveth the flames of fire.
hmr: LALPA râwl chun meichawkhai chu a thlêr hlak a.

en: The voice of Jehovah shaketh the wilderness; Jehovah shaketh the wilderness of Kadesh.
hmr: LALPA râwl chun thlalêr a tlawr hnîng a; LALPA chun Kades thlalêr chu a sukhnîng hlak.

en: The voice of Jehovah maketh the hinds to calve, And strippeth the forests bare: And in his temple everything saith, Glory.
hmr: LALPA râwl chun sazukpui chu tê ân siettir a, Rampui thinghnahai chu a nuoi kawl vawng hlak a: A biekina chun thil iengkimin, “A ropui ie,” an ti seng hlak.

en: Jehovah sat as King at the Flood; Yea, Jehovah sitteth as King for ever.
hmr: LALPA chu Tuilêt lai khan lalah a ṭhung a, Anih, LALPA chu kumkhuoa dingin lalah a ṭhung a nih.

en: Jehovah will give strength unto his people; Jehovah will bless his people with peace.
hmr: LALPA chun a mihai kuomah hrâtna pêng a ta, LALPA chun a mihai chu thla- muongnain malsâwm a tih.
